title: Levels 1-5
subject: Oregon Adult English Language Proficiency Standards (OAELPS) (2023-)

27D99A5AE965493982346A76E3B46244.description: An ELL can… participate in level-appropriate oral and written exchanges of information, ideas, and analyses, in various social and academic contexts, responding to peer, audience, or reader comments and questions.
